      public StudentBehavior(GameBoard gameboard, int id, int nof_student, int available_students, int exchange_students, int drop_student, Behaviors behavior_name)
      Creates the student behavior
      Parameters:
      gameboard - model of reference
      id - card's id
      nof_student - number of students on the card
      available_students - number of students available to retrieve
      exchange_students - number of students available to exchange
      drop_student - number of students available to drop
      behavior_name - name
